title: Why is my ms so high?
body: hi my ms is on 124 all the tim im playing on na but i live in europe can I fix the ping somehow?

replies.body: You do have a long, overseas distance reaching NA so you may have some higher ping.  You can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your local network and improve things a little bit.  Keep in mind that it can't really exceed that distance, and you may want to consider EU regions as well.  Hope that helps!
